notes.text: This advisory aggregates security fixes for the avahi SRPM in CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8. It addresses 7 CVEs: CVE-2021-3468, CVE-2023-1981, CVE-2023-38469, CVE-2023-38470, CVE-2023-38471, and 2 more.
notes.title: Description

document.title: avahi security update for CIQ LTS for Rocky Linux 8.8
